column5: Another thing you will not hear is "we have lost power to one engine, we're flying on our other one". Its a one engine plane. I have flown to the Northern Communities and never felt comfortable. I prefer a two engine plane. On the positive note the engine is extremely efficient keeping costs down and they rarely crash.
My brother inlaw the pilot, had this to say about the 1 engine/2 engine argument. "The second engine only gets you to the site of the crash"
